body.name: Steamer for Clothes Steamer Handheld - 15s Fast Heat-up Portable Steamer with 9.5 Oz Big Water Tank, Handheld Steamer Garment Fabric Wrinkles Remover for Wet and Dry Ironing, Steam Iron with 2 Brush
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 7 hrs 53 mins
features: 【15s Fast Preheating】Most garment steamers on the market take up to 30s to preheat, while our hand-held clothes steamer only needs 15s to preheat, avoiding waste of your valuable waiting time. The 1100W high-power garment steamer continuous steam output of up to 18g/min, strong steam easily through and softens the fabric fiber structure, quickly eliminating wrinkles on the clothes, keeping you neatly dressed and giving a good impression!

【280ml Large Water Tank】Don’t underestimate our portable steamer measures only 10.6x5.3 inch and weighs 2 pounds, it is equipped with a 280ml/9.5oz removable transparent water tank, with a continuous steaming time of up to 15 min, reducing the bother of frequent refilling and improves the efficiency of your ironing. The scale marks on the water tank will let you know the changes in water volume so that you can fill it in time. We recommend injecting purified water.

【Wet / Dry Iron, Hang / Flat Iron】This 2-in-1 steamer for clothes can be a steamer iron or a regular iron, and wet/dry iron, hang/flat iron can be freely combined and matched. When you plug in the steamer without pressing the lock button, you get an iron perfect for dry ironing collar shaping. After pressing the lock button, you can use it as a steamer. Flat ironing is suitable for ironing formal wear and wrinkle-prone clothes, while rack ironing is suitable for steaming some lighter clothes.

【No Spray and Leakage Water】Upgraded stainless steel nozzle design ensures that the garment steamer will not spray or leak water, and you can use it at any angle, whether flat ironing or hanging steaming. The big 4.3x2.2 inch stainless steel panel can touch clothes in a larger area, remove wrinkles from clothes more quickly, and improve ironing efficiency. The 6 foot extra-long power cord allows you to move freely while ironing, no need to worry about a short cord.

【Suitable for all fabrics】Each package contains 1 portable clothes steamer, 1 fabric brush, 1 lint brush, and 1 graduated cup. This handheld garment steamer is suitable for all fabrics, such as wool, silk, fiber fabrics, cotton, denim, curtains, sofa, toys, etc. The compact design allows you to put it in your suitcase or backpack, perfect companion for business trips, vacations, destination weddings!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very practical and easy to use thing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Steamer with many advantages
reviews.reviewText: This is a great steamer. I wasn't sure why it was more expensive than other options, but my friend had it and recommended it. It takes virtually no time to heat up, and steam is quickly ready. The left of the cable is good and helpful for outlets that are little far from where you are steaming clothes. I also like the pieces, never used them in steamers before and they do actually make a difference. Also, it is very easy to hold, coming from a woman with small hands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heat up quick
reviews.reviewText: The steam comes up fast. It heat even and very easy to use. The tank is big enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars worth the value
reviews.reviewText: This small steamer works great! The size of water tank is not too big , it can lasts for around 15 minutes. The size is just right, you can even take it for travel. All in all, great little steamer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I do use the steamer quite a lot. My previous one got destroyed because of the hard water. So far, this one works great. I might update the review after using it for a while. For those who don't like to iron- totally recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Portable and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: It is easy to use by fill up water and plugging into the power to create enough steam to help me smoothing the clothes in a minute. It is small and portable so it is a good tool for travel and events.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gets the job done
reviews.reviewText: This is advertised as a steamer, and, well...it steams. There's nothing fancy about it nor does it need to be, like any other steamer it tends to get the wrinkles out of clothes and works well. The only difference is the price point, where this one is a bit more affordable than the others.This steamer is a good bang for your buck product, it works well, it's on the cheaper end, so pretty solid option if you're looking for deals.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product works amazing easy set up and was definitely worth the money! Highly recommend this to anyone looking for an easy to use steamer!!
